name: Arcanine ex
author: Hikaru Koike

poke_body.name: Fire Remedy
poke_body.effect: Whenever you attach a {R} Energy from your hand to Arcanine ex, remove 1 damage counter and all Special Conditions from Arcanine ex.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flame Swirl
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy or 1 React Energy card attached to Arcanine ex.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
